item.title: How to Upload my Blog to Github
item.description: How to Upload my Blog to Github Upload local server hugo server -t m10c --buildDrafts Use http://localhost:1313/ to check. hugo --theme=m10c --baseUrl="https://Eason366.github.io/" --buildDrafts #Create web page
